original_text: For the Amalekites and the Canaanites are there before you, and ye shall fall by the sword: because ye are turned away from the Lord, therefore the Lord will not be with you.
korean_text: 아말렉인과 가나안인이 너희 앞에 있으니 너희가 그 칼에 망하리라 너희가 여호와를 배반하였으니 여호와께서 너희와 함께 하지 아니하시리라 하나

sentences.original_text: For the Amalekites and the Canaanites are there before you
sentences.korean_translation: 아말렉 사람과 가나안 사람이 너희 앞에 있으니

sentences.original_text: and ye shall fall by the sword
because ye are turned away from the Lord
therefore the Lord will not be with you
